title: Ewbank on Life in Brazil - authors purpose

content.question: Which of the following statements most accurately describes the purpose of this source?

choices.label: To describe life in maroon communities
To convince Brazil to allow enslaved people from the United States to relocate there
To detail the horrors of slavery
To solidify support against the abolition movement in the United States

content.answer: To detail the horrors of slavery

topic.text: 2.16: Diasporic Connections: Slavery and Freedom in Brazil
